price: Ndetse n’abari mu isi bose (azifuza kubatangaho incungu) kugira ngo arokoke.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
